headline.main: JAPANESE EXECUTE DUTCH; Two Reported Killed for Listening to Allied Broadcasts

lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, Australia, June 30 -- The Netherlands Indies Government Information Service reports that a Japanese court martial has punished more Netherlanders in Java for listening to foreign radios. Two were sentenced to death, two to five years' and one to five months' imprisonment, according to the Japanese-controlled Batavia radio.
abstract: Netherlanders executed or imprisoned for listening to foreign broadcasts, Java
